apprenticeships.title: Apprentice Fitter
apprenticeships.description: Learn industrial fitting skills in automobile manufacturing setting.
apprenticeships.how_to_apply: Apply online at careers.tatamotors.com or through your ITI placement cell.
apprenticeships.additional_info: Selected candidates will receive professional certification upon successful completion.

apprenticeships.title: Electrician Apprentice
apprenticeships.description: Comprehensive apprenticeship in industrial electrical systems for power plants.
apprenticeships.how_to_apply: Submit application through BHEL recruitment portal.
apprenticeships.additional_info: Possibility of permanent employment for top performers.

job_openings.title: Automobile Technician
job_openings.description: Perform maintenance and repair of automobiles at Maruti Suzuki service center.
job_openings.how_to_apply: Email resume to careers@maruti.co.in with subject 'Automobile Technician Application'.
job_openings.additional_info: Training in Maruti Suzuki technologies will be provided.

job_openings.title: Junior Welder

job_openings.additional_info: Site allowance and accommodation provided for outstation work.
